title: Phase 1: Create CLI Setup Command
description:
## Overview
Create the unified `launchpad setup` CLI command with platform detection and Mac/Linux provisioning.

## Location
SSH to launchpad@ai:~/projects/launchpad-cli/

## Files to Create
1. `app/Commands/SetupCommand.php` - Main command with platform detection
2. `app/Commands/Setup/MacSetup.php` - Mac-specific provisioning (15 steps)
3. `app/Commands/Setup/LinuxSetup.php` - Linux-specific provisioning (12 steps)
4. `app/Commands/Setup/SetupProgress.php` - Trait for JSON output

## Command Signature
```php
protected $signature = 'setup
    {--tld=test : TLD for local development sites}
    {--php-versions=8.4,8.5 : PHP versions to install (comma-separated)}
    {--skip-docker : Skip Docker/OrbStack installation}
    {--json : Output progress as JSON for programmatic consumption}';
```

## Mac Setup Steps (15 steps)
1. Detect system (macOS, architecture)
2. Check/Install Homebrew
3. Check/Install OrbStack
4. Add PHP tap (shivammathur/php)
5. Install PHP versions
6. Install Caddy
7. Install support tools (Bun, Composer)
8. Create directories
9. Configure PHP-FPM pools
10. Configure Caddy
11. Configure DNS resolver
12. Start PHP-FPM
13. Start Caddy
14. Init Docker services
15. Install Horizon (launchd)

## VERIFICATION
| Check | Command | Expected |
|-------|---------|----------|
| SetupCommand.php exists | `ssh launchpad@ai 'test -f ~/projects/launchpad-cli/app/Commands/SetupCommand.php && echo exists'` | exists |
| MacSetup.php exists | `ssh launchpad@ai 'test -f ~/projects/launchpad-cli/app/Commands/Setup/MacSetup.php && echo exists'` | exists |

| SetupProgress.php exists | `ssh launchpad@ai 'test -f ~/projects/launchpad-cli/app/Commands/Setup/SetupProgress.php && echo exists'` | exists |
| Command has options | `ssh launchpad@ai 'cd ~/projects/launchpad-cli && php launchpad setup --help' \| grep -c '\-\-tld\|\-\-php-versions\|\-\-skip-docker\|\-\-json'` | 4 |
